text: Manasarowar Pushkarini Vidhyasrama PU College is a pre-university college in Mysore, Karnataka, India.Retrieved from Google Maps https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/Deeksha,+Vijayanagar,+Mysuru/@12.3250691,76.6113843,15.25z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x809358a8e62ddbba!8m2!3d12.3244521!4d76.6095066 It is affiliated to Karnataka Pre-University Education Board.Retrieved from Department of Pre University Education, Karnataka http://www.pue.kar.nic.in/PUE/PDF_files/colleges/NN.pdf It is located. It is situated behind Yoganarashima Swamy Temple, Hunsur Road, Vijayanagar 2nd StageRetrieved from National Informatics Centre, Karnataka State Unit http://www.kar.nic.in/pue/PUE/PDF_files/colleges/NN.TXT ==Streams offered== The College offers courses in the below mentioned science streams 1\. PCMB - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology 2\. PCMC - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Computer Science ==Facilities== 1\. Well-equipped Laboratories 2\. Full-fledged Library 3\. Playground 4\. Canteen ==References== Category:Pre University colleges in Karnataka Category:Universities and colleges in Mysore
title: Manasarowar Pushkarini Vidhyasrama PU College
